title: Projecting motion pictures
creator_contributor_role: University of California. Dept. of Theatre Arts. Motion Picture Division, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion pictures - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture projection
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Study and teaching
description: The most important thing a projectionist does is present a film, not just run a projector. The film presumes the student projectionist has a knowledge of the equipment which they are to operate. Stress is on the relationship between the audience and the elements of projecting - seating, screen, loudspeaker, projector and the projection procedure - rather than on the purely mechanical aspects of projection.
